title: Tribunal Punishments?
body: I did my 10 games basically chat banned, but i've done 11 games after that and i'm still getting the message that i cant receive rewards for my gameplay. How long does that last? It's starting to be more of an issue, I have been reformed but if this keeps up I just wont be playing.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body: Stop worrying about how many games you need to finish up to start getting rewards and actually start reforming.

> [{quoted}](name=vencegaming12323,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yzYXXvHu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-22T20:08:49.910+0000)
>
> Stop worrying about how many games you need to finish up to start getting rewards and actually start reforming.

Really? Because I havent said one bad thing or even used All chat for that matter. Who are you to tell me that, You don't even know me.
